long_description: A speedy bike for everyday riding and commutes, the Scott Metrix 40 bike comfortably cruises bike paths and urban streets thanks to its reliable Shimano parts and heads-up riding position. Flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position that also allows better visiblity than traditional road bike drop handlebars. Drivetrain features Shimano components for dependable, lasting performance and easy shifting through the 24 gear combinations. 6061 aluminum alloy frame offers sturdy performance to tackle rough urban roads and paths as well as go the distance on scenic country roads. Tektro RX1 linear-pull brakes make it easy to manage your speed. Fast-rolling and agile 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Schwalbe Spicer tires. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (not included). Specs on the Scott Metrix 40 bike are subject to change.
